name: GMail 2018 Skin Tight
description: When "Compact" is too damn fat.  Trims padding and adjusts fonts to be even tighter.  See more mail.
additional_info:
Let's face it. GMail 2018 gained weight. It took up a lot more screen space than the previous version did, and not even "compact" density can help. Thus, in a bout of frustration, I:
  • Changed the font back to Arial, removing all Roboto references (what a thick font).
  • Shrunk most fonts back down to .75rem (tags are .7rem)
  • Removed padding.
  • Shrunk that Compose button down to size. Don't need a damn brick of a button.
